resources.string: If you love our app, please take a moment to rate it and spread the word :)
Help us increase our coverage in Mumbai
Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.
You set how much\nyou\'d like to share
As you move around, we\'ll\nautomatically connect you to our WiFi networks
You get points every time someone connects to your WiFi network
Get free WiFi in Mumbai, in exchange for sharing some of yours
% of your WiFi you\'d like to share:
Automatically connect me to community WiFi hotspots within range
There\'s a newer version of UnifiApp now available - please go to the Play Store app, click the menu, go to \'My Apps\' and click the \'Update\' button next to UnifiApp to upgrade.
We weren\'t able to send you your credit, but we will keep trying to send it every 15 minutes until it gets sent successfully. Our customer support team will be in touch with you shortly.
We\'ve succesfully sent you 50 Rupees to your mobile phone balance. You will receive an SMS from your carrier shortly. Please wait at least 5 minutes before adding another network. Thanks!
We weren\'t able to send you your credit, but we will keep trying to send it every 15 minutes until it gets sent successfully. Our customer support team will be in touch with you shortly.
We weren\'t able to connect to your WiFi - please update your WiFi password to continue accessing our network
We could not display the coverage map - please contact support to get help.
Your device does not support VPN connections, which are needed to ensure security. Please contact support to get help.
Please select your mobile operator, so we can send you your credit:
You will be prompted to allow the VPN when we connect you, to ensure security
In Range of Community WiFi\nAttempting to connect

Sorry, we couldn\'t determine your location. \nPlease go to your Android Settings app, the Location menu, turn on Location/enable Google Location Services, and try again after restarting.\nIf you need help, please click on \'Chat with Support\' in the menu.
Scanning for nearby WiFi \nnetworks to connect to.\nPlease be within 30 meters to connect.

Please turn on your WiFi so that 
we can try to connect you to
 nearby networks. 
Please click on 'chat with support' 
in the menu to get help.

Please turn on your 2G/3G 
connection in order to
 connect to nearby networks. 
Offline mode is supported, but hasn't been synced recently.

For security reasons, we do not 
support connecting to WiFi networks from rooted devices. 
Please click on 'chat with support' 
in the menu to get help.
You\'ll get 10 points when your friend signs up and adds a WiFi network!
Every month, we give away prizes to the top 3 members on the leaderboard. This month, we\'re giving away Amazon gift cards, and will be announcing the winners on our Facebook page.
You don\'t have any friends on UnifiApp yet - invite them!
Click here to report a problem
Please select your mobile operator, so we can send you your credit:
Please ensure the phone number you entered is 10 digits long, and try again.
Your prepaid mobile # to send 50 Rs. credit to
Get free WiFi throughout Mumbai - download UnifiApp at
How can we help? We are available most hours except between 1:30 - 7:30 PM. We normally respond within 3 hours, and often sooner.
Sorry, we couldn\'t connect to the Internet through this network. Please try again when you\'re connected to a different network.\nIf you need help, please click on \'Chat with Support\' in the menu.

Sorry, we couldn\'t detect your location. \nPlease go to your Android Settings app, the Location menu, turn on Location, and try again (you may need to restart your device).\nIf you need help, please click on \'Chat with Support\' in the menu.
Sorry, our service is not currently available outside of Mumbai. We\'ll let you know when we launch in your city.
Sorry, we could not retrieve your location. Please install the Google Play Services app and try again.\nIf you need help, please click on \'Chat with Support\' in the menu.
Sorry, this WiFi network already has been submitted. Please try again when you\'re connected to a different network.\nIf you need help, please click on \'Chat with Support\' in the menu.

It looks like you\'re currently connected to a network we don\'t support, or a mobile WiFi hotspot (which won\'t always be on, or have unlimited data to share).\nPlease try again later when you\'re connected to a regular WiFi router,\nor click on \'chat with support\' in the menu to get help.

Sorry, that doesn't seem to be correct. 
Please try again.
If you forgot your password, please click on 'F.A.Q.' in the menu.
 Otherwise, click on 'Chat with Support' to get help.

Thanks! 

We'll connect you to our community's WiFi as you come within range automatically.

Thanks! We're sending 50 Rs. to your SIM card now.
We'll connect you to our community's WiFi as you come within range automatically

Get access to another thousand WiFi networks in Mumbai for every friend you invite!

Please select your mobile operator, so we can send you your credit. Depending on your operator, it may take between a minute to over an hour to process - please go to \'Chat with Support\' in the menu if you haven\'t received it within a few hours.
Thanks! Your password has been updated.
Please ensure the password is at least
Please enter in the password to the \'
\' WiFi network.\nYou can set the amount you\'d like to share by going to the Settings menu at any time.
Please enter in the new password to the \'
\' WiFi network\n in order to update it.

You\'ve reached the limit of networks you can add (for security reasons, we only want you to submit your own networks, not those of other people).\nPlease click on \'chat with support\' if you have questions.

You're currently connected to an open WiFi network
 that we can't verify access to & share with our community.

 Please try again later when you're connected to a password-protected network that you'd like to share, or contact us via the 'Chat with Support' option in the menu.
You\'ve already added this WiFi network - please try again later when you\'re connected to a different network.
"You\'re not connected to a WiFi network. \nPlease connect to a WiFi network, and try again.\nIf you need help, please click on \'Chat with Support\' in the menu.
Please turn on your phone\'s WiFi, connect to a network, and try again.\nIf you need help, please click on \'Chat with Support\' in the menu.
We could not determine your WiFi connection settings - please click on \'Chat with Support\' in the menu to get help.
We believe Internet access should be a human right
Help us make Mumbai the first WiFi-sharing city in the world!
